meanings.definition: One who displays or presents something for others to see.
meanings.sent1: The talented exhibiter showcased her artwork at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The museum exhibiter guided visitors through the new exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The funny exhibiter accidentally tripped while setting up the display.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an exhibiter of her happiness and excitement.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights made the exhibiter's work stand out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A substance that enhances the action of another substance.
meanings.sent1: The chemical exhibiter boosted the effectiveness of the cleaning solution.
meanings.sent2: Adding the food exhibiter made the dish taste even better.
meanings.sent3: The secret ingredient turned out to be a surprising exhibiter in the recipe.
meanings.sent4: The music was like an exhibiter, bringing out the emotions in the film scene.
meanings.sent5: The special spice acted as an exhibiter, elevating the flavor of the soup.
